definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up

sentences.english: Permissions will be controlled by a business manager or IT administrator.
sentences.chinese: 权限将由业务经理或IT管理员控制。

sentences.english: A material handler in the downstream location is signaled to withdraw parts.
sentences.chinese: 位于下游的物料管理员收到领取零部件的信号。

sentences.english: Temporary mount directory where sysadmins can mount filesystems.
sentences.chinese: 系统管理员临时加载文件系统的地方。

sentences.english: Most administrators think of paging as something that is onerous.
sentences.chinese: 大多数管理员都认为分页是一件很麻烦的事情。

sentences.english: License for Dangerous Chemical Warehouse Keeper, Electrician and Welder, etc.
sentences.chinese: 危险化学品仓库管理员证，电工证及焊接工等。

sentences.english: But in our experience, too many managers err on the side of mistrust.
sentences.chinese: 但在我们的经验中，有太多的管理员在不信任上犯错。

sentences.english: I work as a network and systems administrator for a mid-sized company.
sentences.chinese: 我就职于一家中型企业担任网络和系统管理员工作。

sentences.english: Enter the password for the Administrator account, then re-enter it as confirmation.
sentences.chinese: 输入管理员帐号密码，然后重新输入以便确认。

sentences.english: Provide the admin and protocol and co-brand for your marketing team.
sentences.chinese: 提供管理员和协议为您的营销团队和合作的品牌。

sentences.english: The experienced senior sysadmin works on the initial class design.
sentences.chinese: 有经验的高级系统管理员可以实现最初的类设计。

sentences.english: Zeng is the administrator of one of the QQ groups of the freshmen in her university.
sentences.chinese: 在大学里，曾仁惠是一个新生QQ聊天群的管理员。

sentences.english: But he was the super’s boy. He couldn’t even play the fiddle.
sentences.chinese: 他不过是个管理员的儿子，他连小提琴都不会拉。

sentences.english: Ask your administrator for the dispatcher location that should be used.
sentences.chinese: 向您的系统管理员询问应该使用的调度程序位置。

sentences.english: Can Delete or edite a Advertiser Ad.
sentences.chinese: 管理员可以查看广告商和出版商。

sentences.english: Security guards of my school dorm regularly give plastic garbage bags.
sentences.chinese: 学校的公寓管理员也会定期发放塑料制的垃圾袋。

definition: to scan a QR code or barcode
